terrain.condition.except{0}: List of Terrain Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Desert, Grass, Swamp'
terrain.condition.if{0}: List of Terrain Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Desert, Grass, Swamp'
terrain.condition.list{0}: List of Terrain Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Desert, Grass, Swamp'
